code: var step=function step(n){return Math.pow(10,(n.toString().split(".")[1]||"").length);};export var calc=function calc(num1,num2,oper){var kf=Math.max.apply(Math,[step(num1),step(num2)]);var res;switch(oper){case"+":res=(Number(num1)*kf+Number(num2)*kf)/kf;break;case"-":res=(Number(num1)*kf-Number(num2)*kf)/kf;break;case"*":res=Number(num1)*kf*(Number(num2)*kf)/Math.pow(kf,2);break;case"/":if(num2==="0"){res="E0";break;}res=Number(num1)*kf/(Number(num2)*kf);break;default:res="0";}return res;};
